publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-977# Michael Matheson: Nuclear Test Veterans-That the Parliament recognises the role played by service personnel during the UK's nuclear test programme in the 1950's; notes the possible correlation between participation in the tests and the development of subsequent illnesses; congratulates the British Nuclear Test Veterans Association on highlighting the concerns of test veterans and Sue Rabbit-Roff on her research into the health effects associated with participation in the tests; further notes the actions of those governments which have compensated their nuclear veterans, and invites the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty's Government calling for suitable compensation for British Nuclear Veterans. Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh*, Colin Campbell*, Bruce Crawford*, Brian Adam*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Andrew Wilson*, Ms Sandra White*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-977# Nuclear Test Veterans (lodged on 7 June 2000) Christine Grahame*, Alex Neil*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-977# Michael Matheson: Nuclear Test Veterans-That the Parliament recognises the role played by service personnel during the UK's nuclear test programme in the 1950's; notes the possible correlation between participation in the tests and the development of subsequent illnesses; congratulates the British Nuclear Test Veterans Association on highlighting the concerns of test veterans and Sue Rabbit-Roff on her research into the health effects associated with participation in the tests; further notes the actions of those governments which have compensated their nuclear veterans, and invites the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty's Government calling for suitable compensation for British Nuclear Veterans. Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh, Colin Campbell, Bruce Crawford, Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Roseanna Cunningham, Andrew Wilson, Ms Sandra White, Tricia Marwick, Christine Grahame, Alex Neil, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tommy Sheridan*, Robin Harper*
S1M-977# Nuclear Test Veterans (lodged on 7 June 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-977# Nuclear Test Veterans (lodged on 7 June 2000) Shona Robison*
S1M-977# Nuclear Test Veterans (lodged on 7 June 2000) Irene McGugan*, Donald Gorrie*, Michael Russell*
S1M-977# Nuclear Test Veterans (lodged on 7 June 2000) Cathy Peattie*, Mr John McAllion*

Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh, Colin Campbell, Bruce Crawford, Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Roseanna Cunningham, Andrew Wilson, Ms Sandra White, Tricia Marwick, Christine Grahame, Alex Neil, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tommy Sheridan, Robin Harper, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Shona Robison, Irene McGugan, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell, Cathy Peattie, Mr John McAllion
